Product Variants

Endpoint: /api/product-variants/

Methods: GET, POST, PUT, PATCH, DELETE

Model Fields

  • product (Product ID)
  • sku (string, unique)
  • attributes (JSON, e.g., {"color": "red", "size": "XL"})

Example Request (POST)

{
    "product_id": 1,
    "sku": "PROD001-RED-M",
    "attributes": {"color": "red", "size": "M"}
}

Error Responses

  • 400 Bad Request - Duplicate SKU or invalid product ID.
